ygData.subject: Exploding Orcs (not really)
ygData.msgSnippet: Jonathan F Adams wrote: I thought at first the artists were suffering from secual deprivation when the females got created, I mean they are rather skimpy.
ygData.messageBody:
Jonathan F Adams wrote:



I thought at first the artists were suffering from secual deprivation
when
the females got created, I mean they are rather skimpy. Still I
think the
wood elf men, barbarians and monks are pretty nice as well.
However its
rather academic as I play for the fun not the cartoons :)

I definatly would have to agree here, I find the females ridculous in
the extreme, and to
any who think I maybe a bit biased (and you'd be right;) I would say
the same if the men
ran around in skimpy chip'n'dales leather thongs and spiked
braclets;)


dont know who is playing the character - male playing female,
vice-versa,
a kid an old man, a young girl, a handsome movei star, a beer
guzzling
crack addict - so you just go by the character itself and dont
worry about
who is behind it as long as the character they play is a decent
person to
be with.


Actually I've been thinking of starting an EQ onelist for bear
guzzling crack addicts, any
takers?;)


want sex chat the web is absoulutely loaded with it :) The only
way it
would be nice is in the actual framework of the game - ie like
amzaon
women, soldier *buddies*, a love affair, a stray encoutner with a
minotaur hehe


WHOAH YEAH!! Um, er, nevermind;)



Well be curious where this may go :)


As am I...

to Lonewolf Grey - nice name :) Have fun in Maine - a nice place
as I
live right next door to maine.


Well thank you and I shall:)

Take care all :)


You as well:)

Lonewolf Grey
